title: Level 2 - Mixed Tactics
description: Review basics and learn new tactical patterns

puzzles.title: Review: Checkmate in 1
puzzles.subtitle: Find the winning move for White
hints: Look for a move that attacks the enemy king on the back rank
puzzles.successMessage: Good review! Back-rank mates are fundamental!
puzzles.failureMessage: Remember: Look for moves that attack the king directly.

puzzles.title: Pin and Win
puzzles.subtitle: White to win material
hints: Look for a piece that can't move without exposing something valuable
puzzles.successMessage: Excellent! The knight is pinned to the king!
puzzles.failureMessage: Look for a way to attack a piece that can't move.

puzzles.title: Discovered Attack
puzzles.subtitle: White to win material
hints: Moving one piece can reveal an attack from another
puzzles.successMessage: Great! The knight must move and the bishop attacks the queen!
puzzles.failureMessage: Think about what happens when the knight has to move.

puzzles.title: Review: Knight Fork
puzzles.subtitle: Find the best move for White
hints: Knights are great at attacking multiple pieces
puzzles.successMessage: Good review! Knight forks are powerful tactics!
puzzles.failureMessage: Look for a knight move that creates multiple threats.

puzzles.title: Skewer the Rooks
puzzles.subtitle: White to win material
hints: A skewer forces a valuable piece to move and exposes a piece behind it
puzzles.successMessage: Perfect! After the king moves, you win the rook!
puzzles.failureMessage: Look for a check that forces the king to abandon the rook.

puzzles.title: Mate in 2 - Queen Sacrifice
puzzles.subtitle: Find the brilliant combination

solutionSequence.comment: Threatening the knight and checkmate on f7

hints: Sometimes the best defense is a strong offense
puzzles.successMessage: Brilliant! You found the forcing sequence!
puzzles.failureMessage: Look for moves that create multiple threats.
